name: Laser Defender (Zadda - Mike)
description:
A project that I made following a course by https://www.gamedev.tv/

I only made some small changes like adding the "green powerups" they will spawn a shield. The red "power ups" will make the enemies shoot 2 beams instead of one.

I should revisit this project still as there are two health bars. The one that is working is the smallest, in the upper left corner!

Controls are arrow keys to move left and right, space to shoot. Apparently clicking the "select level" crashes the game :(

Will fix that in a future build.
